Example_257.text: could the country bears really be as bad as its trailers ? in a word -- yes .

Example_258.text: if high crimes were any more generic it would have a universal product code instead of a title .

Example_259.text: reggio falls victim to relying on the very digital technology that he fervently scorns , creating a meandering , inarticulate and ultimately disappointing film .

Example_260.text: despite the authenticity of the trappings , the film is overblown in its plotting , hackneyed in its dialogue and anachronistic in its style .

Example_261.text: the journey toward redemption feels more like a cinematic experiment than a full-blown movie .

Example_262.text: this is a good movie in spurts , but when it doesn't work , it's at important times .

Example_263.text: there are weird resonances between actor and role here , and they're not exactly flattering .

Example_264.text: the unceasing sadism is so graphically excessive , the director just ends up exposing his own obsession .

Example_265.text: suffocated at conception by its munchausen-by-proxy mum . punish the vehicle to adore the star .

Example_266.text: big fat liar is just futile silliness looking to tap into the kiddie sensibilities .

Example_267.text: usually when i get this much syrup , i like pancakes to go with it .

Example_268.text: all the necessary exposition prevents the picture from rising above your generic sand 'n' sandal adventure .

Example_269.text: glib , satirical documentary that fudges facts , makes facile points and engages in the cinematic equivalent of tabloid journalism .

Example_270.text: gangs of new york is an unapologetic mess , whose only saving grace is that it ends by blowing just about everything up .

Example_271.text: call me a cynic , but there's something awfully deadly about any movie with a life-affirming message .

Example_272.text: a gratingly unfunny groaner littered with zero-dimensional , unlikable characters and hackneyed , threadbare comic setups .

Example_273.text: i guess it just goes to show that if you give a filmmaker an unlimited amount of phony blood , nothing good can happen .

Example_274.text: gaghan captures the half-lit , sometimes creepy intimacy of college dorm rooms , a subtlety that makes the silly , over-the-top coda especially disappointing .

Example_275.text: will anyone who isn't a fangoria subscriber be excited that it hasn't gone straight to video ?

Example_276.text: [evans is] a fascinating character , and deserves a better vehicle than this facetious smirk of a movie .

Example_277.text: loosely speaking , we're in all of me territory again , and , strictly speaking , schneider is no steve martin .

Example_278.text: limps along on a squirm-inducing fish-out-of-water formula that goes nowhere and goes there very , very slowly .

Example_279.text: just the sort of lazy tearjerker that gives movies about ordinary folk a bad name .

Example_280.text: a rambling ensemble piece with loosely connected characters and plots that never quite gel .

Example_281.text: this is a movie that starts out like heathers , then becomes bring it on , then becomes unwatchable .

Example_282.text: i hate the feeling of having been slimed in the name of high art .

Example_283.text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering . instead , it'll only put you to sleep .

Example_284.text: a sleep-inducingly slow-paced crime drama with clumsy dialogue , heavy-handed phoney-feeling sentiment , and an overly-familiar set of plot devices .

Example_285.text: it is depressing , ruthlessly pained and depraved , the movie equivalent of staring into an open wound .

Example_286.text: for the future , one hopes mr . plympton will find room for one more member of his little band , a professional screenwriter .

Example_287.text: reign of fire never comes close to recovering from its demented premise , but it does sustain an enjoyable level of ridiculousness .

Example_288.text: human nature is a goofball movie , in the way that malkovich was , but it tries too hard .

Example_289.text: ram dass fierce grace moulds itself as an example to up-and-coming documentarians , of the overlooked pitfalls of such an endeavour .

Example_290.text: lucky break is perfectly inoffensive and harmless , but it's also drab and inert .

Example_291.text: like an afterschool special with costumes by gianni versace , mad love looks better than it feels .

Example_292.text: the script , the gags , the characters are all direct-to-video stuff , and that's where this film should have remained .

Example_293.text: an excruciating demonstration of the unsalvageability of a movie saddled with an amateurish screenplay .

Example_294.text: how many more times will indie filmmakers subject us to boring , self-important stories of how horrible we are to ourselves and each other ?

Example_295.text: there are some laughs in this movie , but williams' anarchy gets tiresome , the satire is weak .

Example_296.text: the somber pacing and lack of dramatic fireworks make green dragon seem more like medicine than entertainment .

Example_297.text: another wholly unnecessary addition to the growing , moldering pile of , well , extreme stunt pictures .

Example_298.text: the whole thing's fairly lame , making it par for the course for disney sequels .

Example_299.text: its solemn pretension prevents us from sharing the awe in which it holds itself .

Example_300.text: features nonsensical and laughable plotting , wooden performances , ineptly directed action sequences and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory .

Example_1.text: I heart King's. I've always been a fan and this one was as good as my old one in Monaca.

Example_2.text: Love this place. Never had a bad meal. Good portions and great people. Be ready to stand in line.

Example_3.text: Great little place. Treats you like a local.Eaten here 3 times a week for a month. Same overtime. Barb is always here.

Example_4.text: Far away from real Chinese food. Doesn't even taste good as American style Chinese food.

Example_5.text: Papa J's is expensive and inconsistent. The ambiance is nice but it doesn't justify the prices. There are better restaurants in Carnegie.

Example_6.text: I love this place! The food is always so fresh and delicious. The staff is always friendly, as well.

Example_7.text: Some of the best chow around--love this place. The bread and salads and soups are great.

Example_8.text: The worst dental office I ever been. No one can beat it!!! You should avoid it at any time.

Example_9.text: Its clean, open 24/7 with hot shoe string fries and creative milkshakes. What else do you want in life??

Example_10.text: Had a great time at Sing Sing a while ago with friends. Friendly staff. Will return.

Example_11.text: Waterfront Lowe's beats Monroeville Lowe's for lawn and garden. Hate to admit it, but it's true.

Example_12.text: i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!\nO.. But the bartender Melissa was a SUPER bitch and RUDE \nHope they fire her..

Example_13.text: I really miss the Northstar Amber but the specialty beers are always good. Food is excellent and the service staff is friendly.

Example_14.text: Servers are chatting, not paying attention to tables. I can see my salad is ready at the window. Worst serves ever.

Example_15.text: The food was okay. The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--deafening. Awful acoustics!

Example_16.text: The worse \"Chinese food\", even the white rice which came with the ogle sweet and sour chicken is really bad. Please don't eat this food.

Example_17.text: This place.. Is ok if ur grabn something quick .. But they do have a great happy hour tho

Example_18.text: Awful everything. From the bad service, to the diluted soup, to the lame-no chicken on the chicken salad, to the PRE-fabricated pizza. AVOID THIS PLACE!

Example_19.text: Food was ok had a steak w/ shrimp side Ass mashed potatoes. Everything was ok not a lot of flavor.

Example_20.text: Love the stores selection but HATE how the girls chase you around to tell you their sales. If I wanted to know I'd ask !!!

Example_21.text: This store has such bad service. The service staff are rude rude rude. Save your money, shop elsewhere.

Example_22.text: They make a nice breakfast for less than the tip form dinner the night before. That's not bad!

Example_23.text:
A very nice meal in a very nice restaurant

PROS:
Very good food
interesting choices--not your typical red lobster crap
Great service
Very clean (restrooms, included)

CONS:
n/a

Example_24.text: Service an atmosphere was great. I had the shrimp boil and it was very under-seasoned. Much closer to bland than anything.

Example_25.text: Good pizza and i love the breadsticks...i don't know too much else about this place

Example_26.text: Great service, friendly staff, great food, great prices. What more can you ask for in a small town breakfast place? Will definitely be back

Example_27.text: A great little place. Delicious and affordable Italian food. Great salads and pasta. Try the pizza rolls!

Example_28.text: Horrifying. This place should be ashamed of itself. DO NOT STAY HERE. Beyond dirty, just absolutely rank.

Example_29.text: Cookies aren't bad. Haven't had a reason to buy cakes or other pastries. Staff is friendly and it smells like heaven.

Example_30.text: Prices not great for true thrifters. Staff completely useless. No dressing rooms. I simply have nothing to say about this place.

Example_31.text: First time here and I wasnt impressed at all! I should have gone to the dairy queen :-(

Example_32.text: There was absolutely nothing not to like. Reasonably priced wines, home style Italian cooking. Great upbeat ambience.

Example_33.text: Tasteless food that arrived over an hour after it was ordered and was cold. Will never order from here again.

Example_34.text: Minutello's is going out of business. Last day of operation is Sunday, February 17, 2013.

Example_35.text: I love tazza.. Their coffees are excellent and its a great place to enjoy a relaxing evening..I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies..

Example_36.text: Best coffee in Pittsburgh, without a doubt. Believe the hype. I've been going here for years, and every visit is a pleasure.

Example_37.text: This is where I learned what good espresso tastes like. If you make it to Highland Park, stop there and get some great neighborhood atmosphere.

Example_38.text: Really hard to find a good cup of coffee in the states... I'd say this is the best cappuccino I've had since Italy.

Example_39.text: I wish we had a way to hold this corporation accountable for its crimes against our society.

Example_40.text: Great club/bar/lounge/venue. Great mix of people and music with decent bartenders and good prices on beer.

Example_41.text: Absolutely amazing! Great staff and service! Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down. Good work guys!

Example_42.text: Waiting 20 minutes to get one piece of wood cut in an empty store on a Friday afternoon. Priceless!

Example_43.text: I like the pizza and the selection of toppings. They are reliable. Great option for take out food.

Short and sweet, and as a Haiku.

Parking is awful
No wine, but that's PA's fault
Best organic food

Example_45.text: Parking is tough, the food selection is great, and if you call ahead they will set aside awesome moving boxes for you.

Example_46.text: Great stuff here...The cheese plates are great and always changing. Awesome staff, and the menu offers an nice variety!!\n\nAsk for Tim for your waiter!

Example_47.text: Very tasty food and drinks! Its a little pricey, but worth it if you want something better than a typical chain.

Example_48.text: pretty good veggie food. I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here. French toast, tofu scramble, museli, salads, sandwiches, lasagna. They have a pretty decent variety.

Example_49.text: My favorite for Pt. Breeze/Pittsburgh East End. Flat New York style, not greasy, timely delivery, they know my orders!

Example_50.text: Got the rancho and the Greek, not so bad but I probably won't go back... Too heavy for me...

Example_51.text: Kind of small, but I've had excellent luck with produce here: fresh and organic. In-store coffee bar is a nice plus.

Example_52.text: Don't go. I got more problems and sounds on my car after I spent $800 there. unbelievable!

Example_53.text: Get a Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top - absolutely amazing!

Example_54.text: I have had lots of items off of their large menu and everything has been good.

Example_55.text: Mmmmm. Their Egg drop soup is sooo good as is the General Tso's, and they deliver FAST!

Example_56.text: Horrible - they use chicken that's been out uncover all day . And they smoke around the food.:(

Example_57.text: Incredible Italian food. Mushroom appetizer is just phenomenal. So is the mozzarella cheese. Great fish. Expensive but worth it!

Example_58.text: good food, we had the bean appetizer, seafood diablo, and the flounder...It is expensive but well worth the money, classic.

Example_59.text: Love it here. The food was great and had anazing service. Will be back again! Everyone was so poliet and greeted us with a smile.

Example_60.text: Real german food (sausage, etc) and decent beer in family friendly atmosphere.\n\nThis is one of the good joints.

Example_61.text: I must of been eating at another Max's in a pararell universe!\n\nFood was terriable, service was worse! Went and got Sushi!

The old arcade game was excellent and only a few quarters to play.
Drinks nice enough .
Bartenders were really nice.
 NIce enough place.

Example_66.text: Estimated delivery time 45 minutes actually delivery time 120 minutes.\n\nPizza Hut , a pizza of last resort.

Example_67.text: It wasn't as horrid as the reviews would lead you to think. Just don't expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart and you will be fine.

Example_68.text: Awesome spot to grab a dog for a buck. Nothing fancy, must standard ingredients and friendly service.

Example_69.text: This place is amazing from top to bottom. 2 hours down we are still here.

A ring for each finger and a sixth for my... 

other hand!

Go Steelers!!!

Example_74.text: Very disappointed. Delivery was late, our gyros were cold and fries were soggy. I wont be ordering from here again.

Example_75.text: Standard Pittsburgh dive. They had Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap and basketball on the television so no complaints.

Example_76.text: Good coffee, nice walking street, good selection of teas and little gifty things, good pastries, *excellent* scones, and it's not that other green-logo'd coffee place.

Second, this location has great batistas and it's less congested than other CTR'S I've been to.

Example_81.text: One of the best pastries I've had in my life I got here. I think it's called a \"French bearclaw.\"

Example_82.text: Sorry, but our pizza was cold. All nine cuts of it. And the garlic wings didn't taste like garlic. Maybe it was an off night?

Example_83.text: Didn't live up to my expectations at all. Waste of time and money. Sloooooow service.

Example_84.text: Mediocre and poorly made! You can get better quality food from Mcdonalds don't waste your time or money

Example_85.text: Draft selections are good...service is lousy...food is sub par. Not in a hurry to return.

Example_87.text: Great food and very reasonable prices.  Really enjoy the sandwich and big orders of tasty fries.

Example_96.text: Great pie...I could eat a whole large though...if you like a thin crust, you will love this

Example_110.text: Love their spicy black bean dip and their black bean and pineapple quesadilla... mmmm can't get enough of their black bean.

Example_113.text: Not up to it's previous brunch standards. Buffet has scaled back in variety and quality.  Still good but no longer excellent.

Example_114.text: I wish more chains had great quality foods and ambience rich environments. I thoroughly enjoyed my roasted turkey, avo blt!

Example_115.text: Nice, clean local place in Green Tree. Might be a little pricey but the food is good and homemade.

Example_116.text: Food is mediocre service is lousy. I'm sitting here right now and have been out of water and done eating for 20 min...

Typical
bar next to stadium place

Example_121.text: Good food but takes too long before game to get order, be sure to come early, 35 mins to get food.

Example_122.text: Sushi was great. Everyone I was with enjoyed their meal. I will probably not go back because the location is not great.

Example_123.text: Went to an event here. The meatballs were frozen meatballs. It was ok. I probably wouldn't go back to eat.

Example_124.text: Solid place to grab a martini and listen to some sub-par live music. Far from amazing but hey not everywhere is going to be right?

Example_125.text: A beautiful little bar with an exciting \"martini\" list - do step outside your comfort zone and try one of the crafted drinks.

Example_126.text: Nice location, interesting cocktail menu, but nothing is done particularly well. I still go there, but I wish the cocktails were made using fresher ingredients.

Example_127.text: Fares keep going up. Another service cut this month. I think I'd rather walk to work in the middle of the night!

Example_128.text: an efficient way to eat - meat, cheese, fries and slaw! all the food groups in one delicious huge bite.

Example_129.text: Really bad service. Make sure to get in the face of the wait staff or count on being ignored

Example_130.text: Fries were kind of bland and the coleslaw was just ok but the meat was very good. Overall, it's a tasty place with good prices

Example_131.text: I really don't know what the hype is about. I was quite underwhelmed with this restaurant.

Example_132.text: Good sandwiches as you expect, but a bit of a touristic atmosphere. I'm a stickler for the original in the strip!

Example_133.text: Highly disappointing. While sandwich is unique it was totally over cooked and under seasoned. No flavor

Example_136.text: The Lobster Roll Caesar Salad was very good, and the service at the bar was great!

Example_138.text: Not as good as Wholeys but awesome patio and the best service. Go here for the atmosphere, the staff is the best.

Example_139.text: Not bad. Not great. But not bad.  Excellent bang for your buck, especially if you're hungry.

Example_140.text: my falafel was ok, but my brother kabob was really good. great location. reasonable price

Example_141.text: Went here before the regatta yesterday, was my third time here...consistently great, best gyros around!! Thanks.

Example_142.text: Great food, fast service and the price is right. Perfect stop for a quick lunch in the downtown area.

Example_143.text: I love this place. Gyros, spinach pie, fries and hummus. Way better than any other gyro place in Pittsburgh.

Example_144.text: This place has amazing homemade crab bisque soup! My turkey sandwich was good too. Quick and loved the friendly staff.

Example_145.text:
Fettucini from a can, anyone? 

If you like paying $10 for tasteless pasta and sauces, this is your place!

Stay away and never look back.

Example_146.text: Spag Warehouse is the best value for money in the tri-state area.... damn good food!!

Example_147.text: Service is lacking and food is mediocre. When I crave Italian this is not the first place I think of.

Example_148.text: The atmosphere was pretty cool. It really is warehouse like. Could have been better with a bigger crowd. But the food was pretty bland.

Example_149.text: Took two and a half hours to get our food. All our food was the thrown together in the same pan. Not worth the $55.

Example_150.text: owner is a terrible terrible person. tossed me out for no good reason. i found the food very average overall

Example_151.text: If you're seeking bland, salty, Chinese food where every entree tastes exactly the same as the other...this is your place!

Example_152.text: The most delicious pizza and the best cocktails in the area!! Such friendly staff!! I've always had an amazing experience!!

Example_153.text: Been going to Mineo's for the longest time I can remember. Good pizza but certainly not the best one around town! Cash only though!

Example_154.text: Got an amazing facial here. I have been there for a pedicure and massage in the past. It's great.

Example_155.text: This is a crappy, dark theater that leaks water when it rains. Do not go!

Example_156.text: Such a shame. Terrific location, supported by the community and just awful. Filthy, bad seats, more expensive than others. Choose to go elsewhere.

Example_157.text: At the pub/restaurant side I had a very bad experience, terrible food, even worse service. A complete waste of money, avoid at all costs.

Example_158.text: Racist mall management team same team that ran century 3 mall in to the ground stay away nothing good comes out this place

Example_159.text: Mediocre sandwiches and milk shakes. Also, the woman behind the counter was very rude and had a terrible attitude.

Example_160.text: Flavorful not bitter I have only had a double espresso iced & a regular I enjoyed it

Example_161.text: Great interactions, very friendly workers and customers (most of the time). Don't waste your time on the wifi though, it's horrible!

Example_162.text: I went here once when I first moved to Pittsburgh. My shirts came back poorly pressed and some had broken buttons. I was disappointed.

Example_163.text: Love love love this place. They did an amazing job. Favorite place for happy hour.

Example_164.text:
Amazing Two Fish Tempura Fat Roll...one of the best things I've tasted, seriously.
Excellent Thai Corn Chowder.
Incredible Black Cod.
This place does Asian Fusion well!

Example_165.text: Don't come here from NYC looking for a good bagel and lox, stick w the ice cream.

Example_166.text: A little overpriced but the bagels are always good and fresh. The cinnamon French toast (made from their cinnamon log bread) is also very good!

Example_167.text: Great drinks (frozen cosmos!!) but the food and service leaves something to be desired. Try the Sunday brunch!

Example_168.text: use to be a max and erma's and if that bar wasn't low enough it now misses the mark

Example_169.text: Wonderful brunch. The food and service was great. The waiters were very friendly and the food wasn't too pricey. Really a great option for brunch.

Example_170.text: Desert was great - beer was good. Food was under seasoned a bit with out the sauce. Husband liked it with.

Example_171.text: If you're drunk get the kitchen sink wings and mac & cheese bites! Their fried zucchini is pretty good too :)

Example_172.text: If you want to get pastries while being yelled at by the staff and treated like dirt, this is the place for you.

Example_173.text: Amazing pastries! Gotta go and check it out. We had the almond tort, cream horn and the gob. All great! Reasonable prices too.

Example_174.text: Their coffee is solid--better than coffee tree roasters, imo--and the atmosphere is nice and relaxed. Prefer this place over the local chains any day.

Example_175.text: Pamela is a bad representation of this location! Attitude and lack of hygiene is an issue for this \"employee.\" I will not return.

Example_176.text: Large selection of unique/cute-tastic gifts. Humerous knick-knacks/books galore. Very adorable and staff was very pleasant. Looking forward to going back again.

Example_177.text: The store is really fun, just know it gets crowded quickly, especially around the holidays. Don't recommend going with a stroller in tow!

Example_178.text: I got tired of waiting in line with one register open and 10 people in front of me. Won't be back.

Example_179.text: The Holidays are coming and in the 'British' section they are not selling Vegeta seasoning anymore.

Example_180.text: Friendly front desk. A little condescending toward the back. Lovely jewelry, extensive collection of lovely things. Well worth a visit for unique gifts.

Example_181.text: Great place to get an authentic meal. Great wine selection with generous portions. The house dressing is to die for.

Example_182.text: Beautiful ambiance, fantastic service, delicious food, and a personal toast from the owner was a great touch!

Example_183.text: Food, service and atmosphere were excellent. I don't ever post reviews but couldn't believe this place didn't have a higher rating.

Example_184.text: Absolutely horrible. My sink has been overflowing onto my countertops and ruining my belongings multiple times. Management did not even apologize for my inconvenience.

Example_185.text: Really fun. Really packed on weekends. Inexpensive drinks. Also, available to order is a vodka drink made with fresh squeezed fruit.

Example_186.text: Best breakfasts in the Pittsburgh area. Just make sure to bring cash - they don't take credit.

Example_187.text: Cash only. It's a bit pricey for crepes, but it's great to have the restaurant to fulfill crepe cravings :)

Example_188.text:
Very Good!

Got the Beef Stew in Hot Pot. Pretty Spicy, but so delicious. 
Happy to have found this place on our stopover in Shadyside.

Example_189.text: I had steamed chicken and veggies along with hot and sour soup! I would never get tired of it!

Example_190.text: Tyipical \"Chinese restaurant\" menu and flavour. Environment and service is above average, making overall experience decent.

Example_191.text: I didn't find the food all that flavorable, the service isn't great, and it's definitely not worth the price.

Example_192.text: Had dinner here the other night and it was lovely. The dragon phoenix soup was amazing, the service was wonderful, we'll definitely be going back.

Example_193.text: Very unhappy with the sales people did not do what they said they would do service department is very good

Example_194.text: Some of the best pizza I've had since moving to Pittsburgh. And they have good hoagies as well.

Example_195.text: The lady who runs the office is unpleasant and rude. Will not use this garage in the future.

Example_196.text: Fast friendly service and good sandwiches. This is a neighborhood staple that deserves your business.

Example_197.text: Big hotel. Not bad. Bathrooms way too small I had to dry off outside the bathroom. Priceline for good rate.

Example_198.text: Cheap bowling, clean, serves food, & has pool tables. What else could you ask for in a bowling alley?

Example_199.text: I'm a big fan of mc d's but I was expecting more when I saw pork chop biscuit what a fail.

Example_200.text:
Bar food
Decent bar food though.
Waitress was nice
Beer was cold 
Cool paintings and art
Atmosphere was warm and non pretentious

Example_201.text: I definitely learned alot about the south here. Really glad we spent a few hours here. Makes you appreciate modern times.

Example_202.text: Great BBQ plate, amazing slaw on burger. So glad I found this place right near my house.

Example_203.text: The lobby is nice and the pool, fitness room are good. Some floors look a bit dated although rooms are just like other Sheratons.

Example_204.text: Belk at Carolina Place always has amazing customer service. They often compensate when you forget a coupon at the register.

Example_205.text: Wunderbar! Authentic! Eleven German draft beers. The server( Stefanie) was from Dresden and did a great job. Sauerbraten, spatzle, and rot kohl were great!

Example_206.text: The lobster tail was salty. The crab legs were alright. The shrimp was awesome. The asparagus was amazing. All in all it was eh.

Example_207.text: this is just high priced captain D's. they quality has gone downhill over the past decade now I remember WHY I don't eat here.

Example_208.text: Not too crazy about this place. I ordered a pastrami on rye and it was just a pile of meat on soggy bread.

Example_209.text: Definitely not stingy on the meat! The hot corned beef and the baked potatoes are delicious .

Example_210.text: Love this place! Great food, great service, great atmosphere! Mmm table bread, Mountain Dew, & Caesar Salads!!

Example_211.text: GREAT steaks, prepared just the way it was ordered. Highly recommend the Portabello mushroom steak. Fast, friendly service.

Example_212.text: Absolutely wonderful service and the Half Shredded Prime Rib Sandwich and Loaded (and I do mean loaded) potato soup is stupendous

Example_213.text: Waiting in line no one here....3 employees standing around and no one says anything. Horrible service. Next time ill just order on amazon

Example_214.text: Just your typical mall. Nothing out of the ordinary. It was kept pretty clean as well and had a large amount of parking.

Example_215.text: I Had a great steak, great waiter, and great drinks. Nothing to complain about here.

Example_216.text: Slow, absolutely the worst. Horrible communication skills and customer service. I wouldn't imagine In million years how inconsiderate people in the auto business could be.

Example_217.text: Not very good. Dried out food. Some things cold, when they should be hot. Disappoined overall. Not clean, either. 11.99 per person not worth it.

Example_218.text: Did not like it. Luke warm food that was not appetizing or tasteful. Not the cleanest establishment.

Example_219.text: Stay Away! They damaged my car. If I were you I would not risk taking my car or any other vehicle to auto bell.

Example_220.text: Just left there and my car was inspected quickly and no hidden costs. The staff was efficient and quick and that's all I can ask.

Example_221.text: This is a fantastic, well appointed hotel, but with a very easy going staff.\nWe'd definitely stay here again.

Example_222.text: One of the oldest hotdog / hamburger joints in Charlotte. Burgers and hotdogs are fresh and made to order. Charlotte Classic

Example_223.text: Quaint, atmosphere and great food to boot. If you want to break from the norm, start here!

Example_224.text: Love this place. Great food and unique character. A must if you live in Charlotte.

Example_225.text: One of our favorite cozy places to eat in Uptown. Dark and cozy booths, good food, great drinks. Lots of fun memories.

Example_226.text: Incredible nachos. Incredible food. Try their best sellers. Atmosphere is quaint. Great for a casual date night. Enjoy!

Example_227.text: Bad food. Bug problem. In a neighborhood full of homeless roaming the streets like zombies.

Example_228.text: This place is awesome. The \"what it is\"...so delicious. I'm from Cincinnati and we come here at least once any time we are in town.

Example_229.text: Perfect atmosphere. Best BLT, fried pickles and pasta salad(with Stevie's dressing.) One of my favorites in Charlotte.

Example_230.text: Nice people, busy busy busy place, but always great service, fast kitchen.\n\nThe kitchen is super fast for carryout.

Example_231.text: The queen of the bloated corporate steakhouses! Save your money.....find a local street vendor.....and buy tickets to whatever is at the Blumenthal!!

Example_232.text: Good steak. Service was great. Speedy service requested and speedy service received... Would recommend if your looking for a decent steak in the charlotte area..

Example_233.text: Moderate beer choices and decent food. Even though this is a very cookie-cutter Irish pub, not a bad place to kick start your happy hour.

Example_234.text: Was Disaponinted with the amount of time it took me to get service at the bar !! Staff was friendly and the decar was nice.

Example_235.text: This place is great. Good servers. Takiyyah is the best. Ask for her. Great food and a great place to bring a large group.

Example_236.text: Superb service and reliably fine food from this family owned restaurant. Briskly busy at lunchtime, relaxed at night, always comfortable. A pleasure!

Example_237.text: I just called our delivery order in after ringing MANY local establishments that do not deliver. Their customer service is friendly and quick

Example_238.text:
Lack of Atmosphere (Even during sporting events)

Food is terrible.

Bartender/Waitress were incredibly rude....

Everybody has bad days, they should not be this bad.....

Example_239.text: Rooms are very clean and the views are great. The location is right in the heart of Charlotte and convenient to everything - easy walking!!

Example_240.text: Only 2 stars for location. Rooms are humid and smell like wet dog. Worst hotel I have yet to stay in as a consultant.

Example_241.text: Checked this place out while on vacation. They had pretty decent food but the atmosphere was very chain restaurant like. But great beer!

Example_242.text: Nicest patio downtown. There are much better wait staff downtown. Get the beer or wine. Stay away from cocktails. Food = pedestrian.

Example_243.text: Meh, indeed. Decent beer and excellent service. But it's chain food and it didn't do much for me.

Example_244.text: The food was rock bottom. \n\nIt was so disappointing that me and two my friends could not finish our meals.

Example_245.text: Food is good, beer is amazing! Highly recommend stopping in if you're in the neighborhood.

Example_246.text: How can you go wrong with Heavenly Bed and Heavenly Baths? I loved this place!!! If only I could afford to stay here again!

Example_247.text: The Convention Center needs better souvenir store/vendor. Everything looked old and used. Not a lot of souvenirs to pick. Poor souvenir store. Need major improvement.

Example_248.text: Wanted to like this place. Staff very friendly. Reasonable prices. Quick service. \nBut plates were dirty. Table dirty. Food just OK.

Example_249.text: Really, its as good as it gets. The food is hot and fresh. The cornbread is awesome and the service is good...I love this place.

Example_250.text: The cornbread was the best part of the meal, all the other menu items I tried was sub-par.

Example_251.text: Great service and even better soul food. Try the fried green tomatoes, Mac and cheese, collards, catfish and fried chicken.

Example_252.text: The worst restaurant ever! It doesn't matter if the food tastes good or not.. The service is the worst! Lazy and slow as ever!

Example_253.text: Great place. I had a birthday dinner last week. The food and service was great. Friendly staff .. Very pleased.

Example_254.text: Good, honest food, at a fair price, made by cheerful folk. I've been going there for years, and am rarely disappointed.

Example_255.text: Jersey Mike's Tuesday Special is awesome. $7 for any regular sub, chips & a drink. It's usually the only day that I drink soda.

Example_256.text: Excellent service!! Brooke and Hannah are awesome servers!! Food was excellent, chocolate Sauce was scrumptious !! The creme br\u00fbl\u00e9e is amazing!!

Example_257.text: Good food and flavor. Cold greeting at hostess desk. Service good. I would go back.

Example_258.text: Had shrimp and grits for lunch. Was not expecting much having lived on the Gulf Coast but was pleasantly surprised.

Example_259.text: Dinner food is high quality/fresh and the recipes are interesting.\n\nFresh pear butter and biscuits were a nice bonus.

Example_260.text: Fish and chips were great. People should not come here for lunch and discuss business. Enjoy your meal as if it were your last.

Example_261.text: First and last to this club. Very pricy,poor service and no contact dance. ... Other clubs in charlotte are better ... Very disappointed .....

Example_262.text: Great place. Excellent experience. Had the scallops for my main dish. Amazing! If I could give this place 10 stars, I would.

Example_263.text: We had a wonderful, authentic Italian meal on New Year,s Eve. The service was friendly, I rushed. Can't wait to return!

Example_264.text: I can't think of anything due to my food coma but it was all five stars! The blackberry sorbet was a perfect finish.

Example_265.text: Nice hotel, nice warm cookies! I have stayed at this one twice and would recommend to out of towners.

Example_266.text: Average pizza at best and sub-par appetizers. Decent beer specials are only upside. Walk across the street and eat at Fuel for some real pizza.

Example_267.text: Really. Good. Pizza. Great variety of beer and wine. If you are in downtown, and want a good meal, eat here.

Example_268.text: Jerk chicken pizza was excellent. Bomber was good but the fresh oregano over powered everything else. Great beer selection. Service was good.

Example_269.text: Sorry- just doesn't do it for me. The steak is average and it's over run by BoA middle management.

Example_270.text: This is a classic steak house. Good service and great food. Go ahead- spend the extra money. It's worth it.

Example_271.text: One of the best Steakhouses, always consistent. Great food and service. You can people watch at the bar

Example_272.text: This is heaven for steak lovers like me! High quality and moody...I enjoyed my time very well.

Example_273.text: Nice antiquey (if thats a word) atmosphere, tons of tv's and a huge bar. Would visit again!

Example_274.text: Just another liberal bias rag.  It's only redeeming use, is for lining bird cages and starting fires.

Example_275.text: Average bar with a nice outdoor area. You can go cornholing there which is fun.\n\nWish the beer selection was better.

Example_276.text: Go sit at the Bar. The drinks are great and the SUSHI is very good. The women in there are smokin hot.

Example_277.text: Great place to salsa dance on a Saturday night!! A brief lesson is given by some great professionals-check it out!!

Example_278.text: Convenient parking and great exhibit - Body Worlds. The IMAX is wonderful - beware lots of kids everywhere!

Example_279.text: It reminded me of the dirty restroom at the gas station on HWY 40 driving through Texas. Dirty and nasty.

Example_280.text: Disgusting, slow and pathetic. Takes phone orders before the people standing in front of them. Food is subpar. Skip unless starving

Example_281.text: Nice, friendly staff. WIsh they had what I had come in for. Carmex anyone? I thought it was a regular staple at any drugstore....

Example_282.text: Solid hotel, pretty hard beds but clean. Great water pressure and fantastic location. Be sure to join their club for free in room wifi.

Example_283.text: We had our company holiday party here and it was an AMAZING time! Great atmosphere and all of the catering staff were courteous and helpful.

Example_284.text: Salsa club moved next door, but restaurant closed on 08/15/2009. I always wanted to try this place, I'm sad to see it go....

Example_285.text: The staff rocks (and they tell me the food is good, too). Forget your plans; you could wind up staying here all night.

Example_286.text: Went here on a weekday night. I didn't like it and I probably won't be back.

Example_287.text: Hit and miss for lunch and summer. Was told that veggies were all fresh, no way..breakfast better. Homefries good. Omlettes dry and not so good.

Example_288.text: Kevin was excellent- diagnosed the problem quickly, part came fast- called & came on time. Very happy with service & would highly recommend.

Example_289.text: Better than expected. Many salad bar items, excellent corn bread. BF cleared his plate, I did too. Nothing fancy but good food! Staff very attentive.

Example_290.text: Great park for family fun. They even host music festivals there which is fantastic. Something for everyone for sure!

Example_291.text: Awesome rides!!!!! Both children and adults rides were terrific! We went on a Friday and there were no lines! What more can you ask for?

Example_292.text: Carowinds is a fun place.....where else can you spend $4 on a bottle of water?!

Example_293.text: Worst customer service ever. The manager is rude and talks bad about the client and little care for his customer

Example_294.text: it was ok. \n\nmussels were good. service ok. ambiance seemed dated. worth a trip, but not sure i would go back.

Example_295.text: Thumbs up, great wine selection and atmosphere. Must try the Scallops. \nWent during Charlotte Restaurant Week. They accommodated a group of ten.

Example_296.text: Great setting. Big restaurant but great service. Mediterranean. Halibut was killer - in a soup. Major dipping action. A gem!

Example_297.text: White tuna sushi was great! But the Pad Thai just ok. Next time i'll stick to the sushi

Example_298.text: Quick, decent nothing amazing. the fried rice was good and egg drop soup decent. if you're looking just to crave a Chinese craving it works.

Example_299.text: Worst auto bell in town. Do not go here. It wasn't even decent enough for one star.

Example_300.text: I have only been once. Nice staff. Quality ingredients. Tasty and fresh cold cut subs. I had the Italian. Yum!
